exp.libs.sock.socket.nio.common.handler

Class BaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • exp.libs.sock.socket.nio.common.handler.BaseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHandler

    public final class BaseHandler
extends Object
     基本业务处理器
 
 用于在客户编写的业务逻辑前后添加默认操作

    PROJECT : exp-libs
    SUPPORT : https://exp-blog.com
    Since:
    JDK 1.8+
    Version:
    2022-03-06
    Author:
    EXP: exp.lqb@foxmail.com
